metadata.title: CVE-2014-4945 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Horde Internet MailProgram (IMP) before 6.1.8, as used in Horde Groupware Webmail Editionbefore 5.1.5, allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia an unspecified flag in the basic (1) mailbox or (2) message view.

criterions.comment: php-horde-imp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
